question: In pursuance with the recommendations of Narsimhan Committee, the RBI has framed new guidelines
option1: to govern entry of new private sector banks to make the banking sector more competitive
option2: to reduce the freedom given to banks to rationalize their existing branch network
option3: to setup more foreign exchange banks
option4: to lend more easily for industrial development
answer: to govern entry of new private sector banks to make the banking sector more competitive
